refnamediv.refpurpose: Performs a rotation of an object during matrix edit.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Performs a rotation of an object during matrix edit. The rotation is performed, in order: xdeg about the x axis, then ydeg about the y axis, and finally zdeg about the z axis. If the -i flag is given, then the angles are interpreted as increments to the last object rotation. The rotobj command is a synonym for orot.
